channel.title: [Suggestion]Search Engine
channel.description:
Ok, what if we were to put a Search engine after the TOS, before you enter the forums, and when using the search engine, you have a text entry field, 3 buttons, and a basic blue background.
1st button says, submit question. 2nd says Visit MoparScape.org. and the 3rd says, Visit moparisthebest.com. That way, it keeps all of the Moparscapers where they should be, and us, where we need to be.

item.title: [Suggestion]Search Engine
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Thanks, I was hoping we could take care of the constant Moparscape questions that pop up all over the forums. By using the search engine, they could search the Moparscape forums to answer their question.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 08:54:05 PM[/size][hr]Just trying to get some support, I personally think it would take care of the constant moparscape questions.

Read full topic
